title: Interactive Exercise
description:
Create a notification system for the Finance Tracker using Protocols:
- Notifier protocol with send(message: str) method
- EmailNotifier, SMSNotifier, PushNotifier implementations
- AlertService that accepts any Notifier
- Trigger alerts when budget exceeds threshold
instructions:
Create a notification system for the Finance Tracker using Protocols:
- Notifier protocol with send(message: str) method
- EmailNotifier, SMSNotifier, PushNotifier implementations
- AlertService that accepts any Notifier
- Trigger alerts when budget exceeds threshold

hints.text: Use @runtime_checkable for Protocol. Each notifier needs send(message: str) -> bool. AlertService loops through notifiers.

commonMistakes.consequence: Not needed - Protocol uses structural typing
commonMistakes.correction: Just implement the required methods, no inheritance
